start.title: Mysterious Island Beach
start.description: You've washed ashore on a mysterious island. The sand is warm beneath your feet, and you can hear the distant sound of waves. In the distance, you spot three possible paths: a dark cave entrance, a steep cliff leading to what looks like an old lighthouse, and a dense jungle path. You have 10 minutes before the pirate ship arrives - you saw it on the horizon as you swam to shore.

cave.title: Dark Cave Entrance
cave.description: The cave is darker than you expected. You can hear water dripping somewhere deep inside, and there's a musty smell of age and mystery. Your eyes are starting to adjust, and you can make out two passages ahead. You notice some old torches mounted on the walls - they look like they haven't been lit in decades.

deepCave.title: Torch-lit Cave Depths
deepCave.description: With the torch crackling and casting dancing shadows on the cave walls, you can see ancient markings carved into the stone. The passage splits into two directions: one leads to what sounds like a large chamber with echoing drips, the other slopes downward toward the sound of running water.

ancientChamber.title: Ancient Treasure Chamber
ancientChamber.description: Your torch illuminates an incredible sight - you've discovered an ancient treasure chamber! Gold coins, precious gems, and ornate artifacts are scattered across stone pedestals. In the center sits an enormous chest overflowing with pirate treasure. You've found the legendary treasure of Captain Blackbeard himself!

hiddenPassage.description: Your careful exploration pays off! Your fingers find a hidden lever in the wall, and a secret passage opens with a grinding sound. Inside, you discover a small chamber filled with ancient pirate maps and a moderate stash of gold coins hidden in the walls.

lighthouse.description: Inside the lighthouse, you find old nautical equipment and charts. From the top window, you can see the pirate ship getting closer - but you also spot what looks like a hidden cove on the other side of the island with something glinting in the sunlight!

jungle.description: The jungle is thick and humid. Vines hang down like curtains, and you can hear exotic birds calling in the distance. The path forks ahead - one route looks well-worn and easier to follow, while the other is overgrown but you can see what might be stone structures through the foliage.
